comment: The system is illegitimate but unless you try to work within to tear it down, I don't see an out. This dumb idea that by voting you legitimize the system was already disproven by the Greeks a very long time ago. If you don't participate in the system you just get ruled over by inferiors or the worst people.

comment: But even at its' core it's divisive. Monarchy did a lot of bad shit, but it didn't divide the nation on national issues. It divided on class. I like the idea of dividing on class by way of the pillar of society - the working family. Let a working family vote, vote per family.
